title: Epic Battle
briefDescription: Epic Battle is a fun and challenging mini-game inside Minecraft. Players will spawn in a little village, where they will loot chests, craft items, etc. ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Epic Battle is a fun and challenging mini-game inside Minecraft. Players will spawn in a little village, where they will loot chests, craft items, etc. While that?s happening, a series of events will occur where you have to take care of that, as well as your opponent. Last person standing wins!

title: Find the Button: Half Heart
briefDescription: After 3 weeks, finally I can present to you, my very first map I ever created,Find the Button: Half HeartFind the Button: Half Heart is ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
After 3 weeks, finally I can present to you, my very first map I ever created,
Find the Button: Half Heart
Find the Button: Half Heart is a map which consist of levels inside, you need to find a button each level to access the next level.
Not challenging enough?
Then you need to complete this map with only HALF A HEART.

title: OG TNT Wars
briefDescription: Some of you may know this, but way back in 2014, PrestonPlayz, Lachlan, Vikkstar123, Woofless, BajanCanadian, JeromeASF, and many other youtubers used to have a series ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Some of you may know this, but way back in 2014, PrestonPlayz, Lachlan, Vikkstar123, Woofless, BajanCanadian, JeromeASF, and many other youtubers used to have a series of TNT Wars videos. This map is an almost perfect recreation of the map they played on.
If you don?t know what TNT Wars even is, basically all you do is build cannons to destroy the brick wall in the center and then kill the enemy team with the cannons!
Even the chests are the same!
Build awesome cannons!

title: Super Death Run
briefDescription: Welcome to Super Death Run! In this map, you will try to complete an obstacle course while one player tries to sabotage the runners with ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Welcome to Super Death Run! In this map, you will try to complete an obstacle course while one player tries to sabotage the runners with dangerous traps! Can you reach the end? Download this map today!

title: Sumo Mini-Game
briefDescription: Sumo is a game where you and other players are teleported into a small arena, surrounded by a lava moat below. Push all other players ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Sumo is a game where you and other players are teleported into a small arena, surrounded by a lava moat below. Push all other players into the lava to win!

title: Find The Button! (Rage-Quitting)
briefDescription: You know what to do in this game, Find the BUTTON. This can be 1 player game or 2 players game, but if any of player clicks ...

crawledImageUrls.text: You know what to do in this game, Find the BUTTON. This can be 1 player game or 2 players game, but if any of player clicks the incorrect button, it may kill all player, and they?ll spawn at their checkpoint. If any player does find the correct button, they?ll then be teleported to the next level. It is not really in order of getting harder or not, so you?ll have to play to find it out!

title: Kitpvp
briefDescription: A action packed awesome gameplay experience! New updates that come out frequently! And made by awesome hardworking creators, and we have tried our hardest to ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
A action packed awesome gameplay experience! New updates that come out frequently! And made by awesome hardworking creators, and we have tried our hardest to make it your best gameplay experience. Make sure to play fairly and don?t cheat!
You spawn in a circle in the air from which you can chose to jump into four different areas, Jungle, Nether, Ocean, or Desert!
The Jungle is filled with many trees and even a tree house with some secret areas throughout it as well. The Nether area contains a nether fortress and some lava filled and leaking volcanoes. The Ocean/prismarine area has many strange structures and even a fishing area! And the Jungle is filled with many trees and even a tree house with some secret areas throughout it as well. The Nether area contains a nether fortress and some lava filled and leaking volcanoes. The Ocean/prismarine area has many strange structures and even a fishing area! And finally the Desert location is filled with many cactuses and even its own desert cave!
Annnnnyways you then get to drop down from the area and battle it out in the Arena! There is also a shop to buy new gear you can also chose to join your own teams and form alliances! Also Windows 10 is ummmmm? well not as good as java *cough* *cough* (trash). Haaaaave fun! (Also don?t attack players in spawn). And yes you can use fishing rods to fish! ?

title: Racing Obstacle Course
briefDescription: Try to beat your friends in this racing obstacle course. You?ll have to make your way through multiple obstacles to win your place in ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Try to beat your friends in this racing obstacle course. You?ll have to make your way through multiple obstacles to win your place in the race!
You think you can come in first place?
Every player will start at the start line.
Once the race has been set to start, you?ll have a 5 second heads up!
There are many ways for a player to fall behind in this race!
But there is also many ways to avoid falling behind!
Try to come in first place!!

title: NukeTown (Call Of Duty Black Ops) [PvP]
briefDescription: Use of Deadly Force is Authorized! Try to Beat your Friends in This NukeTown Map! This is a PvP Mini-Game with 6 minute Rounds! You Can ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Use of Deadly Force is Authorized! Try to Beat your Friends in This NukeTown Map! This is a PvP Mini-Game with 6 minute Rounds! You Can Get To Choose New Gun Sets Every Round!
You Will Need the Add-on Actual Guns to Play this Map. It Will NOT WORK without the Behavior & Resources Pack. Download Actual Guns , https://mcpedl.com/actual-guns-addon/
You Will Start in a Area Where you will be able to pick your Set of Guns: Rifles/Sniper >> Sub-Machine Guns/Shotguns >> Pistols.
From There You?ll Be Able to Choose the Ammo of the Guns You Chose along with 3 FlashBangs and 2 Smokes Bombs.
Free-For-All
After the 6min Are Over All Players will be Able to Choose New Set Of Guns!

title: Ruin Raiders [Minigame] [PvP]
briefDescription: Ruin Raiders 1.0 is finally here! Up to 8 people battle to be the last man standing in a randomly generated map, with a kit of their ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Ruin Raiders 1.0 is finally here! Up to 8 people battle to be the last man standing in a randomly generated map, with a kit of their choice. No two games are the same!
At the start of the game a map is randomly generated, then players must pick a kit to play with. These kits must be brought with coins that are earned by playing. Then the players are teleported into random rooms and they must fight to the death

crawledImageUrls.text:
This is a fully functional Survival Game/Battle Royale map with a working border and random loot that will change every time the map is reloaded. There are structures and mountains to explore and plenty of loot for everyone.
Overhead map.
Mountain house
The start room has 2 options that can be changed by flipping these levers
The start area has a small outdoor location for players to wait

title: SPLEEF! [AUTOMATIC]
briefDescription: Spleef is a well-known game in the Minecraft community. This map is an automatic version of it! The goal of the game is to make ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Spleef is a well-known game in the Minecraft community. This map is an automatic version of it! The goal of the game is to make other players fall of a platform by breaking blocks! Be the last one standing to win!
This version of Spleef is completely automatic! Refill, Team selection, winning player, spectator mode? All of those are featured in the map!
Features :
-Ingenious game launching system with player detection
-Team selection for players
-Automatic launch and refill
-When a player loses, he becomes a spectator
-Winning player is displayed
? maximum 4 players playing at a time (other players can spectate by pressing a button)
Enjoy the map!
Screenshots :

title: Chicken Catcher [Minigame]
briefDescription: The Chicken Catcher map is an endless mini-game where the player has to remotely control a character in order to catch chickens (as the title ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
The Chicken Catcher map is an endless mini-game where the player has to remotely control a character in order to catch chickens (as the title suggests). Each time a chicken is caught, coins are given which can be used to customize your character. Try to get the highest score as you can!
Youtube trailer:

title: The Death Master [Minigame]
briefDescription: Do you like having complete control over your friend?s life? Do you like pretty buttons which spawn deadly traps that could kill them instantly? ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Do you like having complete control over your friend?s life? Do you like pretty buttons which spawn deadly traps that could kill them instantly? What if I told you this map was full of that? If you said ?yes? or ?I would be happy? to any of those, then let me introduce you to the Death Master!
The Death Master is a multiplayer map where there are 2 people: a test subject, and a death master. The test subject has one goal: obey the death master. If the test subject doesn?t follow the death master?s every will, then the death master will have to do THEIR job: kill the test subject in a variety of entertaining ways. This includes, but isn?t limited to:
Zombies!
Lava!
Battle arenas!
And much, much more!

title: Time Stuck
briefDescription: Time Stuck is an unforgettable adventure where you've been stuck in a certain time which you need to stop to move on. Now you'll have ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Time Stuck is an unforgettable adventure where you?ve been stuck in a certain time which you need to stop to move on. Now you?ll have to complete the challenges to break the looped time, to break the Time Stuck!
[STORY]: You are alone in a current train station called Clockwork. And you are about to go to the next station called Freeland. But something unnecessary happened, you?ve been stuck inside the time. You need to continue looping the time to end it. Now it?s your TIME to do it, to stop the Time Stuck.

title: Xenodroidz Player vs Mob Arena
briefDescription: In this map, you will fight a monster that can shoot 100 shulker bullets at once. Those shulker bullets don't have any effect but they will ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
In this map, you will fight a monster that can shoot 100 shulker bullets at once. Those shulker bullets don?t have any effect but they will give you many damage
You will be spawned in a small base. Take a gun, bullets, armor and foods, then go to the teleportation room to enter the arena.
Always remember to keep a distance from this monster. He can kill you easily at close range.
